      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>28c77832-0054-4f78-8aa6-534b8e36a649#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Kolumbuszt búcsúja</string>
            <string language="en">Farewell Of Colombus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abschied Von Colombus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Adieu de Colombus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Farewell De Colombus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Addio Di Colombus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίο Colombus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Adiós De Colombus</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Kolumbuszt búcsúja az utazás előtt</string>
            <string language="en">Farewell of Columbus before the journey</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">felfedező, kolumbusz, búcsú, amerika, csónak</string>
            <string language="en">discoverer, Columbusz, farewell, America, boat</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abschied von Columbus vor der Reise</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Adieu de Columbus avant le voyage</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Farewell de Columbo antes da viagem</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Addio di Columbus prima del viaggio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίο του Columbus πριν από το ταξίδι</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Adiós de Columbus antes del viaje</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entdecker, Columbusz, Abschied, Amerika, Boot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">découvreur, Columbusz, adieu, Amérique, bateau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">descobridor, Columbusz, farewell, América, barco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">discoverer, Columbusz, addio, America, barca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανακαληπτής, Columbusz, αντίο, Αμερική, βάρκα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">descubridor, Columbusz, adiós, América, barco</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
